Articles.Content:
I always have KSP crash ever since I got a mod I've deleted, I've deleted a few others, yet still not working. I use ksp 1.3.0 and I Think that it happens around the module manager part, I've reinstalled it, yet no help. Only 2 mods that are overdated that have work without issue.

(moderator edit:) The logs:  https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1dIT9ZKwzue1zvHl7ABX5kAhYKxEc9r5k?usp=sharing

Mod list https://i.imgur.com/tcDGLmW.png

Edited February 24, 2018 by Kerbal101
inserted logs into OP

Hello @Jack5.exe!

I am sorry that you have the issue. However, may I ask you to find the log file (which is text file) and upload it instead, and also make the pictures (which are images) of contents inside of the Gamedata? This is because redistributing the Gamedata as whole may (or may not) cause legal issues and the logs are much better to solve the problem; and this is also why I had to edit your post to remove the link.

Thank you very much for understanding!

9 hours ago, Kerbal101 said:

Hello @Jack5.exe!

I am sorry that you have the issue. However, may I ask you to find the log file (which is text file) and upload it instead, and also make the pictures (which are images) of contents inside of the Gamedata? This is because redistributing the Gamedata as whole may (or may not) cause legal issues and the logs are much better to solve the problem; and this is also why I had to edit your post to remove the link.

Thank you very much for understanding!

 

3

Heres the log: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1dIT9ZKwzue1zvHl7ABX5kAhYKxEc9r5k?usp=sharing

@Jack5.exe Hello again! Thank you! I have added the log link that you posted into OP, I hope that it is okay!

Personally, I can only think of the problem with mod that is stored in the "BlueDog" folder, as it is last to see in the logs right before the crash.
I recommend to move it out of Gamedata and rerun the game. In general, by moving half of the mods out of gamedata until the problem is solved - you can essentially  bissect the cause and then report it into development thread of that specific mod.

Unfortunately, this is all I can help. Perhaps other members may come to assist you, if the above does not work.
Kind regards

22 minutes ago, Kerbal101 said:

@Jack5.exe Hello again! Thank you! I have added the log link that you posted into OP, I hope that it is okay!

Personally, I can only think of the problem with mod that is stored in the "BlueDog" folder, as it is last to see in the logs right before the crash.
I recommend to move it out of Gamedata and rerun the game. In general, by moving half of the mods out of gamedata until the problem is solved - you can essentially  bissect the cause and then report it into development thread of that specific mod.

Unfortunately, this is all I can help. Perhaps other members may come to assist you, if the above does not work.
Kind regards

Yep, It was Bluedog, Thanks!

@Jack5.exe Very nice! Really glad that its solved!

But still, I recommend re-posting this whole issue into thread of Bluedog (a description of the problem and a link into this thread will suffice), so that you and others could use the mod in the future!
